name: Battle of Biscuits
description:
Welcome to Battle of Biscuits!

In the beginning, Biscuitkind lived in peace and harmony with nature. However, after a century of peace, one Biscuit, named Sir Dunkalot, uncovered the secrets of dunking into hot beverages. The world of Biscuitkind has forever changed as it was plunged into an abyss of never-ending was between two factions: the coffee dunkers and the tea dunkers. While both factions believe that its a biscuits joy to dunk and be eaten, there is a bitter fight over which beverage is best suited for the dunk. The coffee dunkers believe that biscuits should enjoy the sweet aroma and flavor of the coffee beans. On the other side on the table sits the mighty tea dunker, who argues that biscuits should enjoy their immersion in hot and flavorful bath of herbs. After years or war, The Great Dunking War is close to an end. It’s your job to ensure that your enemies’ mug is dunked by as many biscuits as possible, thus ruining the drink and proving that it isn’t suitable for dunking; for the perfect drink is limitless and full of flavor!

How to Play:
